EmailTemplate.subject: How to handle store returns, payments & more right now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> You might be having to close your store(s) temporarily because of distancing mandates and other issues.
Or your store is still open, but pivoting to online operations.
From returns, payments and cash management to handling your NCR technology and changing your checkout to support a “new normal”, here’s some guidance to help. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In a time of uncertainty, count on NCR.
Our retail solutions experts are in the trenches with our customers, working hard to help provide guidance, solutions and recommendations <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/retail]]>.
Contact your Account Executive directly to explore options for adding new self-checkout technology or adapting your existing technology to be touchless. You can also find us at NCR.com/retail <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail]]>, have us call you back <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us?path=https://www.ncr.com/retail]]>, call us in the U.S. at 1-800-CALL-NCR or call outside of the U.S. at 1-937-445-1936.
